Name: butyl acrylate production | butyl acrylate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of butyl acrylate (100%) by means of esterification of acrylic acid with methanol. According to von Däniken et al. (1995), 5.70 E-01 kg butanol and 5.90 E-01 kg acrylic acid are required for the manufacturing of 1 kg butyl acrylate.;Reference:;von Däniken A. and Chudacoff M. (1995) Vergleichende ökologische Bewertung von Anstrichstoffen im Baubereich - Band 2: Daten. Buwal Schriftenreihe Umwelt Nr. 232. BUWAL, Bern.
